body:
Summary:
* Update HDF5 constraints, cartesian product is no longer required with clingo.
* Removed HDF5 1.10 constraint in favor of handling building with later versions of HDF5 with `H5_USE_110_API` option.

Purpose:
* The ecp-data-vis-sdk requires HDF5 v1.12. This will allow conduit, and then ascent, to build in that environment without requiring `ascent@develop` in the spec. This is blocking #28693 and #28712 .

@cyrush
title: Conduit: Convert HDF5 constaint to compile flag
